verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto him, <S%H834>after<s%> he had <S%H935>gone<s%> in to <S%H1339>Bathsheba.<s%> Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> according to your loving <S%H2617>kindness:<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> out my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%>
<S%H3526>Wash<s%> me <S%H7235>thoroughly<s%> from my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H5352>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H8548>ever<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.

Against you, you <S%H905>only,<s%> have I <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight:<s%> that you might be <S%H6663>justified<s%> when you <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and be <S%H2135>clear<s%> when you <S%H8199>judge.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I was <S%H2342>shaped<s%> in <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> and in <S%H2399>sin<s%> did my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3179>conceive<s%> me.
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> you <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H2910>inward<s%> parts: and in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> part you shall make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H2398>Purge<s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and I shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H3526>wash<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3835>whiter<s%> than <S%H7950>snow.<s%>
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness;<s%> that the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which you have <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins,<s%> and <S%H4229>blot<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
<S%H1254>Create<s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me.
<S%H7993>Cast<s%> me not away from your <S%H6440>presence;<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> not your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from me.
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> to me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> and <S%H5564>uphold<s%> me with your <S%H5081>free<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Then will I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> your <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H7725>converted<s%> to you.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> you my <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H5046>show<s%> forth your <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
For you <S%H2654>desire<s%> not <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> else would I <S%H5414>give<s%> it: you <S%H7521>delight<s%> not in <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> a <S%H7665>broken<s%> and a <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> you will not <S%H959>despise.<s%>
Do <S%H3190>good<s%> in your good <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> you the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall you be <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> with <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering: <S%H227>then<s%> shall they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> on your <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
